spell_tooltip.description: Your next Keg Smash deals 50% additional damage, and stuns all targets it hits for 3 sec.
Purifying Brew deals 20% of cleared damage split among nearby enemies. After clearing 100% of your maximum health in Stagger damage, your next Breath of Fire incapacitates targets for 4 sec.
Guard the 4 closest players within 15 yards for 15 sec, allowing you to Stagger 20% of damage they take.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 771,077 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 1 million Nature damage to all enemies, and 743,518 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.


Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Reduces the cooldown of Roll by 5 sec and increases its maximum number of charges by 1.
Increases all damage dealt by 2%.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Increases the range of Leg Sweep by 4 yds.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Reduces the cooldown of Ring of Peace by 5 sec and Song of Chi-Ji's cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 120 sec.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 4% increased movement speed. Stacks with other similar effects.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 20% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.

You gain a bonus effect based on your current health.

Above 90% health: Movement speed increased by 5%. This bonus stacks with similar effects.

Between 90% and 35% health: Damage taken reduced by 5%.

Below 35% health: Healing received increased by 10%.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.

Smash a keg of brew on the target, dealing 224,721 Physical damage to all enemies within 8 yds and reducing their movement speed by 20% for 15 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Grants Shuffle for 5 sec and reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 3 sec.

Clears 60% of your damage delayed with Stagger.

Instantly heals you for 25% of the damage cleared.

Niuzao's teachings allow you to shuffle during combat, increasing the effectiveness of your Stagger by 100%.

Shuffle is granted by attacking enemies with your Keg Smash, Blackout Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick.

When you take damage, you have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 457,758.

Rising Sun Kick and Blackout Kick have a chance to summon a Healing Sphere.

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 443,655.
Dealing damage with Blackout Kick increases the damage of your next Keg Smash by 10%, stacking up to 4 times.
When you fall below 40% health, you gain an absorb for 30% of your recently Purified damage, or a minimum of 8% of your maximum health. Cannot occur more than once every 15 sec.

Drinking from your Brews has a 100% chance to toss a keg high into the air that lands nearby after 3 sec, dealing 137,254 damage to all enemies within 8 yards and reducing their movement speed by 50% for 15 sec.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 1.4 million damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 101,283 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 62,732 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
When you consume a Healing Sphere or cast Expel Harm, your current Stagger amount is lowered by 5%.
Blackout Kick's damage increased by 20% and it strikes an additional 2 targets.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.

Fortifying Brew increases Stagger effectiveness by 15% while active.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Chug some Black Ox Brew, which instantly refills your Energy, Purifying Brew charges, and resets the cooldown of Celestial Brew.
Gain up to 15% Mastery based on your current level of Stagger.
Activating Purifying Brew or Celestial Brew grants you 10% dodge for 5 sec.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, your next Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick deals 100% increased damage.

Your Breath of Fire ignites your right leg in flame for 8 sec, causing your Blackout Kick and Spinning Crane Kick to deal 50% additional damage as Fire damage and refresh the duration of your Breath of Fire on the target.

Stagger is 2% more effective at delaying damage.

You gain up to 5% Haste based on your current level of Stagger.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 539,502 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 41,821 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 5% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 1 stack of Elusive Brawler.
Tiger Palm has a 50% chance to deal 200% of normal damage and reduce the remaining cooldown of your Brews by 1 additional sec.

Casting Purifying Brew grants a charge of Ox Stance, increased based on Stagger level. When you take damage that is greater than 60% of your current health, a charge is consumed to increase the amount you Stagger.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%.
Breath of Fire: Damage increased by 50%, and damage reduction increased by 5%.
Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 2 additional sec.
Celestial Brew: Gain up to 3 additional stacks of Purified Chi.
Purifying Brew: Pauses Stagger damage for 3 sec.

For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 9%. Additionally, Keg Smash cooldown is reset instantly and enemies hit by Keg Smash or Rising Sun Kick take 8% increased damage from you for 10 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Triggering a bonus attack from Press the Advantage or casting Weapons of Order releases a surge of chi at your target's location, dealing Nature damage split evenly between all targets over 8 sec.

 Press the Advantage:
Deals 399,576 Nature damage.

 Weapons of Order:
Deals 799,152 Nature damage and reduces the cooldown of Weapons of Order by 4 for each affected enemy, to a maximum of 20 sec.

Store vitality from 15% of your damage dealt and 7% of your effective healing.

For 10 sec after casting Celestial Brew your spells and abilities draw upon the stored vitality to deal 40% additional damage over 8 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 100% increased damage and healing.
When Aspect of Harmony ends, any remaining vitality is expelled as damage over 8 sec, split among nearby targets.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 5%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Celestial Brew has 1 additional charge.
Purifying Brew removes 10% additional Stagger and causes you to absorb up to 131,547 incoming Stagger.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 25% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Purifying Brew stores 131,547 vitality, increased based on Stagger level.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage, it has a chance to spread to a nearby enemy. When you directly attack an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 779,735 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 777,532 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Removes all Poison and Disease effects from the target.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
While out of combat, your movement speed is increased by 15%.
Paralysis now removes all Enrage effects from its target.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.

Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
Increases your maximum health by an additional 10% and your damage taken is reduced by an additional 10% while Fortifying Brew is active.
Magical damage done increased by 4% and healing done increased by 4%.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 20% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Increases your Physical damage done by 4% and Avoidance increased by 4%.

Healing Sphere:

Healing Sphere:
Summon a Healing Sphere visible only to you. Moving through this Healing Sphere heals you for 452,952.

Summons a whirling tornado around you, causing 201,539 Physical damage over 8.6 sec to all enemies within 8 yards. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.

Rising Sun Kick grants a stack of Elusive Brawler.

After using Breath of Fire, you breathe fire 2 additional times, each dealing 27,909 Fire damage.

Breath of Fire damage increased by up to 100% based on your level of Stagger.

A swig of strong brew that coalesces purified chi escaping your body into a celestial guard, absorbing 1.4 million damage.

Purifying Stagger damage increases absorption by up to 200%.
When you would be healed above maximum health, you instead convert an amount equal to 40% of your critical strike chance to a heal over time effect.
Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 8 sec. Being hit by a melee attack, or taking another action will cancel this effect.
Rising Sun Kick grants a stack of Elusive Brawler.

Breathe fire on targets in front of you, causing 100,300 Fire damage. Deals reduced damage to secondary targets.

Targets affected by Keg Smash will also burn, taking 62,732 Fire damage and dealing 5% reduced damage to you for 12 sec.
Purifying Brew instantly heals you for 25% of the purified Stagger damage.
When you consume a Healing Sphere or cast Expel Harm, your current Stagger amount is lowered by 5%.
Blackout Kick's damage increased by 20% and it strikes an additional 2 targets.
When you use Keg Smash, the remaining cooldown on Breath of Fire is reset.
Increases the duration of Stagger by 3.0 sec.
Gain up to 15% Mastery based on your current level of Stagger.
Activating Purifying Brew or Celestial Brew grants you 10% dodge for 5 sec.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, your next Tiger Palm or Spinning Crane Kick deals 100% increased damage.

Your Breath of Fire ignites your right leg in flame for 8 sec, causing your Blackout Kick and Spinning Crane Kick to deal 50% additional damage as Fire damage and refresh the duration of your Breath of Fire on the target.

Hurls a flaming keg at the target location, dealing 539,502 Fire damage to nearby enemies, causing your attacks against them to deal 41,821 additional Fire damage, and causing their melee attacks to deal 100% reduced damage for the next 3 sec.
Blackout Kick deals an additional 5% damage. Blackout Kick critical hits grant an additional 1 stack of Elusive Brawler.
Each time you dodge or an enemy misses you, the remaining cooldown on your Brews is reduced by 0.5 sec. Effect reduced for each recent melee attacker.
Tiger Palm has a 50% chance to deal 200% of normal damage and reduce the remaining cooldown of your Brews by 1 additional sec.
Keg Smash deals 20% additional damage, and has 1 additional charge.

Blackout Kick also empowers your next ability:

Tiger Palm: Damage increased by 100%.
Breath of Fire: Damage increased by 50%, and damage reduction increased by 5%.
Keg Smash: Reduces the remaining cooldown on your Brews by 2 additional sec.
Celestial Brew: Gain up to 3 additional stacks of Purified Chi.
Purifying Brew: Pauses Stagger damage for 3 sec.

For the next 30 sec, your Mastery is increased by 9%. Additionally, Keg Smash cooldown is reset instantly and enemies hit by Keg Smash or Rising Sun Kick take 8% increased damage from you for 10 sec, stacking up to 4 times.

Triggering a bonus attack from Press the Advantage or casting Weapons of Order releases a surge of chi at your target's location, dealing Nature damage split evenly between all targets over 8 sec.

 Press the Advantage:
Deals 399,576 Nature damage.

 Weapons of Order:
Deals 799,152 Nature damage and reduces the cooldown of Weapons of Order by 4 for each affected enemy, to a maximum of 20 sec.
Chi Burst and Chi Wave deal 100% increased damage and healing.
When Aspect of Harmony ends, any remaining vitality is expelled as damage over 8 sec, split among nearby targets.
Casting a Physical spell or ability increases the damage and healing of your next Fire or Nature spell or ability by 5%, and vice versa. Stacks up to 5.
Tiger's Lust grants 20% movement speed to up to 2 allies near its target.
Celestial Brew has 1 additional charge.
Purifying Brew removes 10% additional Stagger and causes you to absorb up to 131,547 incoming Stagger.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm deal 25% additional damage to enemies in a line in front of you. Damage reduced above 5 targets.
Rising Sun Kick, Blackout Kick, and Tiger Palm contribute 30% additional vitality.
Casting Purifying Brew stores 131,547 vitality, increased based on Stagger level.

When Aspect of Harmony deals damage, it has a chance to spread to a nearby enemy. When you directly attack an affected target, it has a chance to intensify.

Targets damaged or healed by your Aspect of Harmony take 20% increased damage or healing from you.
Fists of Fury now reduces all targets movement speed by 90%, and you Parry all attacks while channelling Fists of Fury.
You fire off a rope spear, grappling the target's weapons and shield, returning them to you for 5 sec.
Heals the target for 1.8 million over 7.6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Kick upwards, dealing 790,860 Physical damage.
Increases a friendly target's movement speed by 70% for 6 sec and removes all roots and snares.
Kick upwards, dealing 791,567 Physical damage.
Grants an additional charge of Roll and Chi Torpedo.
Reduces all damage taken by 3%.
Reduces the target's movement speed by 50% for 15 sec, duration refreshed by your melee attacks.
Expel Harm's healing increased by 5% and critical strike chance increased by 15%.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Every 10 sec, your next Vivify becomes instant and its healing is increased by 20%.

This effect also reduces the energy cost of Vivify by 75%.
Increases all damage dealt by 4%.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 1 million Nature damage to all enemies, and 749,998 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.


Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Rising Sun Kick deals 70% increased damage. Spinning Crane Kick deals 10% additional damage.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 120 sec.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 50%.
Tiger Palm also applies Eye of the Tiger, dealing 47,767 Nature damage to the enemy and 45,029 healing to the Monk over 8 sec. Limit 1 target.
Touch of Death can now be used on targets with less than 15% health remaining, dealing 35% of your maximum health in damage.
Touch of Death increases your damage by 5% for 30 sec after being cast and its cooldown is reduced by 90 sec.
Your attacks have a chance to resonate, dealing 15,541 Nature damage to enemies within 8 yds.
Summons a White Tiger Statue at the target location for 10 sec, pulsing 69,772 damage to all enemies every 2 sec for 10 sec.

Pummels all targets in front of you, dealing 1.2 million Physical damage to your primary target and 701,929 damage to all other enemies over 3.8 sec. Deals reduced damage beyond 5 targets. Can be channeled while moving.
Absorbs all damage taken for 10 sec, up to 50% of your maximum health, and redirects 70% of that amount to the enemy target as Nature damage over 6 sec.
Increases your maximum Chi by 1, maximum Energy by 20, and your Energy regeneration by 10%.

While out of combat, your Chi balances to 2 instead of depleting to empty.

Every 15 sec, your next Tiger Palm also casts Expel Harm and deals 30% additional damage.

 Expel Harm
Expel negative chi from your body, healing for 175,633 and dealing 10% of the amount healed as Nature damage to an enemy within 20 yards.

Draws in the positive chi of all your Healing Spheres to increase the healing of Expel Harm.
Tiger Palm damage increased by 30%.
Blackout Kick critical strike chance increased by 4% and critical damage increased by 8%.
Fists of Fury damage increased by 15%. When Fists of Fury deals damage, it has a 5% chance to refund 1 Chi.

Spinning Crane Kick's damage is increased by 18% for each unique target you've struck in the last 20 sec with Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, or Rising Sun Kick. 

Stacks up to 5 times and only applies to the primary target of each effect.

Soar forward through the air at high speed for 1.5 sec.
 
If used again while active, you will land, reducing the movement speed of enemies within 8 yds by 70% for 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick has a chance equal to 100% of your haste to trigger a second time, dealing 544,437 Physical damage and restoring 1 Chi.
Blackout Kick damage increased by 10% and strikes an additional 2 targets at 80% effectiveness.
Increases maximum Energy by 30. Tiger Palm's Energy cost reduced by 5.

Split into 3 elemental spirits for 15 sec, each spirit dealing 40% of normal damage and healing.

You directly control the Storm spirit, while Earth and Fire spirits mimic your attacks on nearby enemies.

While active, casting Storm, Earth, and Fire again will cause the spirits to fixate on your target.
Strike with both fists at all enemies in front of you, dealing 922,906 Physical damage and reducing movement speed by 50% for 6 sec.

Whenever you deal damage to a target with Fists of Fury, you gain a stack of Chi Energy up to a maximum of 30 stacks.

Using Spinning Crane Kick will cause the energy to detonate in a Chi Explosion, dealing 339,096 Nature damage to all enemies within 8 yards, reduced beyond 5 targets. The damage is increased by 5% for each stack of Chi Energy.
The duration of Storm, Earth, and Fire is extended by 0.25 sec for every Chi you spend.
Touch of Death deals 20% increased damage and can be used a second time within 5 sec before its cooldown is triggered.
Summons an effigy of Xuen, the White Tiger for 20 sec. Xuen attacks your primary target, and strikes 3 enemies within 10 yards every 1.0 sec with Tiger Lightning for 36,443 Nature damage.
Your Combo Strikes grant a stacking 1% chance for your next Fists of Fury to grant 3% critical strike, haste, and mastery and invoke Xuen, The White Tiger for 10 sec.
Xuen strikes your enemies with Empowered Tiger Lightning every 4 sec, dealing 8% of the damage you and your summons have dealt to those targets in the last 4 sec.

Rising Sun Kick critical strikes reduce the cooldown of Fists of Fury by 4 sec.

When Fists of Fury ends, the critical strike chance of Rising Sun Kick is increased by 40% for 5 sec.
Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Spinning Crane Kick increase damage dealt by your next Fists of Fury by 3%, stacking up to 10 times.
You gain 33% haste for 20 sec after summoning your Celestial.
Removing hostile magic effects from a target increases the healing they receive from you by 10% for 10 sec, stacking up to 3 times.
Heals the target for 1.8 million over 7.6 sec. While channeling, Enveloping Mist and Vivify may be cast instantly on the target.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.

Vivify healing is increased by 40%.
Detox additionally removes all Poison and Disease effects.
Incapacitates the target for 1 min. Limit 1. Damage may cancel the effect.
Increases all healing taken by 4%.

Increases all damage dealt by 4%.
Reduces the cooldown of Paralysis by 15 sec and the cooldown of Leg Sweep by 10 sec.
Split your body and spirit, leaving your spirit behind for 15 min. Use Transcendence: Transfer to swap locations with your spirit.
Jabs the target in the throat, interrupting spellcasting and preventing any spell from that school of magic from being cast for 3 sec.

Turns your skin to stone for 15 sec, increasing your current and maximum health by 20% and reducing all damage you take by 20%.

Combines with other Fortifying Brew effects.

Hurls a torrent of Chi energy up to 40 yds forward, dealing 1 million Nature damage to all enemies, and 737,057 healing to the Monk and all allies in its path. Healing and damage reduced beyond 5 targets.


Casting Chi Burst does not prevent avoiding attacks.
Form a Ring of Peace at the target location for 5 sec. Enemies that enter will be ejected from the Ring.
Fortifying Brew cooldown reduced by 120 sec.
Expel Harm's critical healing is increased by 50%.
Reduces magic damage you take by 60% for 6 sec, and transfers all currently active harmful magical effects on you back to their original caster if possible.
Reduces all damage you take by 20% to 50% for 10 sec, with larger attacks being reduced by more.
Expel Harm's healing is increased by up to 100%, based on your missing health.
You and your allies within 10 yards have 8% increased healing taken from all sources.
You and your allies within 10 yards take 4% reduced damage from area-of-effect attacks.
When your healing spells heal an ally whose health is below 35% maximum health, you gain an additional 10% healing for the next 4 sec.

When a hit deals more than 12% of your maximum health, reduce all damage you take by 40% for 4 sec.

This effect cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Wraps the target in healing mists, healing for 429,981 over 6 sec, and increasing healing received from your other spells by 30%.

Surrounds the target with healing mists, restoring 271,012 health over 20 sec.

If Renewing Mist heals a target past maximum health, it will travel to another injured ally within 20 yds.
Encases the target in a cocoon of Chi energy for 12 sec, absorbing 7.4 million damage and increasing all healing over time received by 50%.

Receive a jolt of energy, empowering your next spell cast:

Enveloping Mist: Immediately heals for 400,810 and is instant cast.
Renewing Mist: Duration increased by 10 sec.
Vivify: No mana cost.
Rising Sun Kick: Cooldown reduced by 9 sec.
Expel Harm: Transfers 25% additional healing into damage and creates a Chi Cocoon absorbing 2.4 million damage.

For every 250,000 Mana you spend, you gain 1 stack of Mana Tea, with a chance equal to your critical strike chance to generate 1 extra stack.

Mana Tea:
Consumes 1 stack of Mana Tea per 0.5 sec to restore 44,625 Mana and reduces the Mana cost of your spells by 30% for 1.00 sec per stack of Mana Tea consumed after drinking.

Can be cast while moving, but movement speed is reduced by 40% while channeling.

Tiger Palm causes your next Blackout Kick to strike an additional time, stacking up to 4.

Blackout Kick has a 12% chance to reset the remaining cooldown on Rising Sun Kick.

Heals all party and raid members within 40 yds for 1.9 million and clears them of 3 harmful Magic, all Poison, and all Disease effects.

Healing reduced beyond 5 targets.
Vivify heals all allies with your Renewing Mist active for 226,028, reduced beyond 5 allies.
Vivify critical strikes and Rising Sun Kicks reduce the remaining cooldown on Revival by 1 sec, and Revival heals targets for 15% of Revival's heal over 10 sec.
Drink a healing elixir, healing you for 10% of your maximum health.

Renewing Mist's heal over time has a chance to cause your next Vivify to also trigger a Zen Pulse on its target and all allies with Renewing Mist, healing them for 211,880 increased by 6% per Renewing Mist active, up to 30%.
Life Cocoon applies Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist to the target.

Summon an effigy of Chi-Ji for 25 sec that kicks up 3 Gust of Mists when you Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, or Spinning Crane Kick, healing up to 2 allies for 130, and reducing the cost and cast time of your next Enveloping Mist by 33%, stacking.

Chi-Ji's presence makes you immune to movement impairing effects.
Zen Pulse triggers a second time at 80% effectiveness if cast on targets with Enveloping Mist.
Rising Sun Kick and Enveloping Mist apply Renewing Mist for 6 seconds to an ally within 40 yds.
Reduces the cooldown of Life Cocoon by 45 sec.
While channeling Mana Tea you exhale the breath of Yu'lon, healing up to 5 allies within 15 yards for 60,803 every 0.5 sec.
Increases Enveloping Mist's duration by 1 sec and its healing bonus by 10%.

While active, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji heal up to 5 nearby targets with Enveloping Breath when you cast Enveloping Mist, healing for 141,397 over 6 sec, and increasing the healing they receive from you by 10%.

When activated, Yu'lon and Chi'Ji apply Chi Cocoons to 5 targets within 40 yds, absorbing 3.7 million damage for 10 sec.
Mana Tea now channels 50% faster and generates 20% more Mana.

Strike the ground fiercely to expose a path of jade for 30 sec, dealing 78,211 Nature damage to up to 5 enemies, and restoring 162,189 health to up to 5 allies within 30 yds caught in the path.Stagger is 5% more effective for 8 sec against enemies caught in the path.
Your Tiger Palm, Blackout Kick, Rising Sun Kick, and Crackling Jade Lightning heal up to 5 injured allies within 40 yds for 30% of the damage done, split evenly among them.
Chi Cocoons now apply Enveloping Mist for 4 sec when they expire or are consumed, and Chi-Ji's Gusts of Mists healing is increased by 20% and Yu'lon's Soothing Breath healing is increased by 500%.

Draws in all nearby clouds of mist, healing the friendly target and up to 2 nearby allies for 182,514 per cloud absorbed.

A cloud of mist is generated every 8 sec while in combat.
Your Blackout Kicks strike 3 targets and have an additional 10% chance to reset the cooldown of your Rising Sun Kick while within your Jadefire Stomp.
Increases Sheilun's Gift cloud of mist generation to every 4 sec.
Rising Sun Kick heals all allies with your Renewing Mist and Enveloping Mist for 31,663, and extends those effects by 4 sec, up to 100% of their original duration.
Sheilun's Gift heals 2 additional allies and its cast time is reduced by 0.5 sec.
